raw_body: SONDAPPERUMAARACHCHI – DON MERRIL (S.A.D.A. Merril) of Averiwatta,​ Wattala (Retired,​ Colombo Commercial Co. Teas Ltd.). Loving son of late S.A.A.D.S. Francis and late Mary Engratia,​ loving brother of late Edmond Joseph,​ Adeline Mary,​ Julius Nazarene,​ Mable Maria Regina,​ Theodore Cyprian and Andrew Peter,​ passed away. Funeral service was held on Sunday 15 October at St. Anne’s Church,​ Wattala and interment was at the Public Cemetery,​ Wattala – Roman Catholic Section. 192/​4,​ 2nd Lane,​ Passion Gardens,​ Pattiywatta Road,​ Kothalawala,​ Kaduwela 10640.066453
